name: Low Poly Shooter: Anomaly-VXL
description: Something I made over the weekend just for funsies. You are put into a building and sent to hunt down "Anomalies" one by one until they have all been removed, then make your way back to the entrance. The enemy and ammo placement is randomized every time to help give a bit of replayability. Other than that, nothing too much to it. Have fun!
